quote: Men have had every advantage of us in telling their own story. Education has been theirs in so much higher a degree the pen has been in their hands. I will not allow books to prove anything.
quote_letters: MEN HAVE HAD EVERY ADVANTAGE OF US IN TELLING THEIR OWN STORY EDUCATION HAS BEEN THEIRS IN SO MUCH HIGHER A DEGREE THE PEN HAS BEEN IN THEIR HANDS I WILL NOT ALLOW BOOKS TO PROVE ANYTHING
